returns._0: the TWAP price of the pair of tokens
the TWAP price of the pair of tokens

initialize(address,address).notice: Initialize the oracleState for the pair of tokensThe order of the tokens does not matter

updateOracleState(address,address).notice: Update the oracle _state for the pair of tokensThe order of the tokens does not matter for updating the oracle _state, it only matters if we need to retrie the price
